languages.text: {n}Буровые установки вонзились в горную породу, сотрясая новый добывающий сектор. Визг и скрежет донесся из недр штреков.{/n}
{n}The new extraction sector shook as drilling machinery tore into the rock. From the depths of the mining drifts came the sound of screeching and scraping.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Буровые установки вонзились в горную породу, сотрясая новый добывающий сектор. Визг и скрежет донесся из недр штреков.{/n}

{n}The new extraction sector shook as drilling machinery tore into the rock. From the depths of the mining drifts came the sound of screeching and scraping.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der neue Extraktionssektor erzitterte, als Bohrmaschinen in den Fels eindrangen. Aus den Tiefen der Minenschächte erklang ein Knirschen und Kreischen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The new extraction sector shook as drilling machinery tore into the rock. From the depths of the mining drifts came the sound of screeching and scraping.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der neue Extraktionssektor erzitterte, als Bohrmaschinen in den Fels eindrangen. Aus den Tiefen der Minenschächte erklang ein Knirschen und Kreischen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sondaj makineleri kayayı parçalarken yeni ayıklayıcı sektörü sarsıldı. Maden galerilerinin derinliklerinden ciyaklama ve kazıma sesleri geliyordu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The new extraction sector shook as drilling machinery tore into the rock. From the depths of the mining drifts came the sound of screeching and scraping.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sondaj makineleri kayayı parçalarken yeni ayıklayıcı sektörü sarsıldı. Maden galerilerinin derinliklerinden ciyaklama ve kazıma sesleri geliyordu.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una fuerte sacudida recorrió el nuevo sector de extracción cuando la perforadora se hundió en la roca. Una cacofonía de chirridos y sonidos rechinantes se elevó desde las profundidades de los pozos mineros.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The new extraction sector shook as drilling machinery tore into the rock. From the depths of the mining drifts came the sound of screeching and scraping.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una fuerte sacudida recorrió el nuevo sector de extracción cuando la perforadora se hundió en la roca. Una cacofonía de chirridos y sonidos rechinantes se elevó desde las profundidades de los pozos mineros.{/n}

languages.text: {n}钻探机的巨型钻头深入岩体之中。新的开采局域不断轰鸣，采矿竖井的深处也传来了尖锐的刮擦声。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The new extraction sector shook as drilling machinery tore into the rock. From the depths of the mining drifts came the sound of screeching and scraping.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}钻探机的巨型钻头深入岩体之中。新的开采局域不断轰鸣，采矿竖井的深处也传来了尖锐的刮擦声。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le nouveau secteur de forage s'est ébranlé lorsque les outils ont percé la roche. Des hurlements stridents et des bruits de griffures ont alors résonné dans les profondeurs des galeries.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The new extraction sector shook as drilling machinery tore into the rock. From the depths of the mining drifts came the sound of screeching and scraping.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le nouveau secteur de forage s'est ébranlé lorsque les outils ont percé la roche. Des hurlements stridents et des bruits de griffures ont alors résonné dans les profondeurs des galeries.{/n}

languages.text: {n}新設の採掘セクターは、掘削機が岩盤をえぐるたびに揺れた。坑道の奥からは、耳障りなきしみとこすれる音が響いてきた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The new extraction sector shook as drilling machinery tore into the rock. From the depths of the mining drifts came the sound of screeching and scraping.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}新設の採掘セクターは、掘削機が岩盤をえぐるたびに揺れた。坑道の奥からは、耳障りなきしみとこすれる音が響いてきた。{/n}
